title: Instructional Design and Learning Technology Expert Competency Enhancement Course: Field Application in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on instructional design competencies combining theory and practice using mixed research methods, fostering the ability to apply IDLT (Instructional Design and Learning Technology) specialized for mathematics education contexts

learning_goals: Participants can develop instructional design models for mathematics education using mixed research methodologies
Participants can produce mathematics learning content in constrained technological environments (smartphone-based)
Participants can design formative assessment tools to measure the effectiveness of mathematics learning
Participants can apply IDLT theories (e.g., ADDIE model) to mathematics education settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
